name: Update3DTextLabelText
warnings: If text[] is empty, the server/clients next to the text might crash!
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Updates a 3D Text Label text and color.

params_body.name: Text3D:id
params_body.description: The 3D Text Label you want to update.

params_body.name: color
params_body.description: The color the 3D Text Label should have from now on.

params_body.name: text[]
params_body.description: The new text which the 3D Text Label should have from now on.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
